paper_abstract: In this paper, we propose a novel single-electron device for computation of a Voronoi diagram (VD). A cellular-automaton model of VD formation [18] was used to construct the device that consisted of three layers of a 2-D array of single-electron oscillators. Through extensive numerical Simulations, we show pattern formation on the proposed device and demonstrate the VD computation.
paper_title: A single-electron reaction-diffusion device for computation of a Voronoi diagram
